Question: Shenzhen Peter Power Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Peter Power Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: Senmenti 0 Electric Motorcycle

- 100 horsepower
- Top speed of 125 mph
- 0 to 60 in 2.8 seconds
- 16.9 kWh battery with a range of up to 186 miles
- Two-seater with fast charging from zero to 80 percent in half an hour
